changelog.desc: Bugfix for Brewery Beer Unloading not working

** This is a new Major release with multiple dependency updates ** 

 *DEPENCENCY UPDATES* 

 - RailLoader [Beta V 1.8.1.1] 
 - StrangeCustoms [V 1.6.24142.2228] 
 - Alinas Map Mod [V 1.3.24142.1848] 

 At the time of release all these mods are only available in the Railroader discord.

 * Changes *

 - Renamed all Atlas Sulfuric Acid unloading and loading locations to Atlas Sulfuric Acid B1 
 - Renamed A.L. Cooke Coal Merchants (Birdtown) industry to A.L. Cooke Coal Merchants. 
 - Moved 'Altas Sulfuric Acid', 'Birdtown House track', 'A.L. Cooke Coal Merchants' and 'Birdtown Iron Ore Mine' to a new area called Birdtown 
 - Added a repair shop to Birdtown with three repair tracks, the parts capacity is half the capacity of the Whittier engine facility. 
 - Increased the height of powerpoles in Ela near the Brewery.

- Updated RailLoader dependency to V 1.8.1.1 to fix loading of mod before NicksBirdtown 
 - Readded combined names for same unloading / loading trackspans 
 - Moved Ela yard expansion buildsite  
 - Removed unnessecairy dependency for LoadIds 
 - Fixed json formatting; removing trailing commas
HOTFIX to fix not loading after nicksBirdtown

HOTFIX to fix crashing loading of other mods: 
 - Removed name changes to industry components

- Updated RailLoader dependency to V 1.7.99.0 
 -Added update check
- Addded repair capabilities to repair facility in Birdtown, this is linked to the Whittier Engine Service Industry.
- Fixed name for Ela_Slaughterhouse Loading component to the correct name

- Added multilple progression steps to the Birdtown mod by NickB. These include: 
  - A 3 step rebuild of the bridge between Ela and Birdtown
  - A build step to connect the Bendorsey Brewery and Ela Slaughterhouse to the town of Ela
  - A build step to add the yard in Ela for use by either the local industries or as a staging platform for the branchline
  - A build step to add additional track for more convenience to the Brewery
 - Renamed unloading / loading locations to not have multiple names for the same trackspans. These changes are display changes only.
  - Renamed Bendorsey Brewery Malt, Hops and Grain unloading locations to Bendorsey Brewery R1 / R2
  - Renamed Birdtown House track Gasoline, Lumber and Misc unloading locations to Birdtown House Track R1
  - Renamed Ela Slaughterhouse Livestock Unloading and Ela Slaughterhouse Livestock Loading to Ela Slaughterhouse B1
